definition: to rise/to raise/to get up/to set out/to start/to appear/to launch/to initiate (action)/to draft/to establish/to get (from a depot or counter)/verb suffix, to start/starting from (a time, place, price etc)/classifier for occurrences or unpredictable events: case, instance/classifier for groups: batch, group
to take charge of/to manage/department (under a ministry)

sentences.english: What can we do to make those cheese spread lighter and creamier , also low in fat?
sentences.chinese: 怎樣纔可以做出低脂又美味的起司抹醬呢？

sentences.english: Ricotta cheese in cream sauce with the thinly sliced potato.
sentences.chinese: 馬鈴薯和法式白醬加上口感濃郁的瑞卡達起司。

sentences.english: The woman is going to introduce the procedure for making a cheese cake.
sentences.chinese: 那位女士即將紹制起司蛋糕續驟。

sentences.english: Lots of people eat cheese made from sheep’s milk.
sentences.chinese: 很多人都喜歡喫羊奶做的起司。

sentences.english: I'd like to order a large cheese pizza.
sentences.chinese: 我想要點一個大的起司披薩。

sentences.english: When you eat, the cheese will melt in you mouth.
sentences.chinese: 一口咬下後雞排中的起司會融化在口中。

sentences.english: Locals simply love their Chicken Cheese Pie.
sentences.chinese: 本地人最喜歡喫他們的機肉起司派。

sentences.english: Tomatoes and cheese are the main ingredients of pizza.
sentences.chinese: 番茄和起司是披薩的主要材料。

sentences.english: First prize in each race was a big piece of cheese.
sentences.chinese: 每場比賽的首獎都是一大塊起司。

sentences.english: If you know anything about mice, you know that mice like cheese.
sentences.chinese: 假如你瞭解老鼠的習性，你一定知道老鼠喜歡起司。

sentences.english: She added some green chili peppers to her cheese dip to make spicier .
sentences.chinese: 她在起司沾醬中加了一些青辣椒讓它辛辣一點。

sentences.english: You can eat ham, cheese and chicken chops.
sentences.chinese: 除了可以喫到雞排更能喫到火腿和起司。

sentences.english: He is the cheese to my macaroni.
sentences.chinese: 他是我義大利通心麪上的起司。

sentences.english: A lovely evening of new idioms and fresh mozzarella.
sentences.chinese: 一個由新成語和新鮮起司所構成的愉快夜晚。

sentences.english: Can I have extra cream cheese for the bagel?
sentences.chinese: 我的貝果可以多加一份奶油起司嗎？
